Actions.Name: Get list of stores
Actions.Description: Get list of stores that one can upload documents to and receive EDI notifications for.

Actions.Name: When a despatch advice is received
Actions.Description: When an EDI despatch advice document is received by zReports this notification is triggered.

Actions.Name: When an invoice is received
Actions.Description: When an EDI invoice document is received by zReports this notification is triggered.
